June 28, 1961
Mr* Harvey Zorbaugh
Executive Officer
Conaaunication Arts Group
Now York University
Washington square
New York 3, Nsw York
Dear Hr* Zorbaugh t
We ere sending you under separate cover twenty copies (fewer
quantities of some articles) of NAEB promotion materials as
directed by Elmer Sulzer, chairman of the NAEB Public Relations
Comittee. These are for distribution at your workshop on
Instructional Television, July 5-August 11.
Thank you very much for cooperating in this.
Sincerely yours.
Publications Editor
